## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description            | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `max`    | `max`     | Maximum value of input | `string` | `'100'`     |
| `min`    | `min`     | Minmum value of input  | `string` | `'0'`       |
| `type`   | `type`    | type of slider         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `value`  | `value`   | value of input         | `string` | `'20'`      |
